Name: OceanSphere
Notes: A sphere of water that essentially functions as a visible WaterArea. If the stage's name is TearDropGalaxy, it becomes translucent and uses a lighter shade of blue; if the stage's name is SkullSharkGalaxy, it retains the dark blue color but becomes translucent as well. When it appears through a cutscene, the water will scale up first.

DemoCast.Description: The object takes part in the cutscene. The object won't appear until this cutscene causes it to do so through a cutscene action.

DemoSimpleCast.Description: Continues movement during cutscenes, NPC conversations, etc. Only works if the object isn't already part of another cutscene.
